data.title: NC State Football Celebration NIL Event, featuring Philip Rivers, Scotty McCreery and more
data.meta_description: Savages Wolves and Pack of Wolves NIL collectives will host an NC State Football Celebration event later this month.
data.text:
RALEIGH, N.C. -- NIL has changed the landscape of college sports forever.

NC State has two collectives -- Savages Wolves and Pack of Wolves -- that are committed to supporting its student-athletes.

On Wednesday, July 19, Savage Wolves and Pack of Wolves will host an NC State Football Celebration, which will benefit the football program, and the collectives that support the Wolfpack. The event will take place in Raleigh at North Ridge Country Club from 6 p.m. to 10 p.m.

To purchase a table or tickets CLICK HERE! If you can't attend, you can still donate by CLICKING HERE!

The celebration will feature a live auction that will include a chance to bid on several exclusive NC State experiences. All proceeds from the evening will go directly to support NIL activities for NC State Football players. Thus far, $165,000 has been raised.

The star-studded guest list will include former Pack football greats Philip Rivers,Nyheim Hines, DeWayne Washington, Alim McNeill, Jacobi Meyers, Emeka Emezie, Tanner Ingle, Thayer Thomas, Larrell Murchison, James Smith-Williams, Mike Glennon, Justin Burris, Koren Robinson, Jerricho Cotchery and more!

Their will also be musical performances by country music star and NC State alum Scotty McCreery and Chander James.

Table sponsorships and ticket information is below:

$10,000 Table Sponsorship includes 8 reserved seats and 4 invites to VIP Meet and Greet 2 REMAINING!

$5,000 Sponsorship includes 8 reserved seats for the event

To purchase a table, CLICK HERE, click 'Become a Sponsor' on the left bar.

Tickets

$1,250 Ticket includes one (1) reserved seat and one (1) invitation to the VIP Meet and Greet

$625 Ticket includes one (1) reserved seat

For more information CLICK HERE, and click 'Get Tickets' in the top right hand corner.

Questions? Contact Chris Vurnakes at chris@packofwolvesnil.com or (919) 451-4602

Click Here for your chance to attend NC State Football Celebration, which will include thrilling live auction featuring exclusive NC State experiences!

All proceeds from the evening will go directly to support NIL activities for NC State Football players. Your generosity will help us to continue to support our players!

ATTIRE: Country Western or Business Casual - dress to your comfort enjoy a fun night celebrating NC State Football with great food, friends and music.
